name.description: Name or title given to the budget

shared.description: Flag indicating if the budget is shared among multiple campaigns

amount.description: Total budget amount allocated for the campaign

currency.description: Currency code for the budget amount

amountRemaining.description: Amount of budget remaining to be spent

creationTime.description: Timestamp when the budget was created

lastModified.description: Timestamp of the last modification made to the budget

startDate.description: Start date of the budget's validity period

endDate.description: End date of the budget's validity period

runForever.description: Boolean indicating if the budget runs indefinitely

type.description: Type or category of the budget

pacing.description: Pacing strategy used for spending the budget

marketer_id.description: Identifier of the marketer associated with the budget
